alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 29 at 3:36AM MDT until October 29 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Feet, Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Feet and Western Mosquito Range and East Chaffee County Above 9000 Feet. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft
